course_title: Senior Seminar: The Business of Film
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 55 / Seats Avail: 24Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: Class Dates:  This seminar will be taught in person on Thursday/Friday, September 22 & 23 and on Thursday/Friday, December 1 & 2.  The fifth session will be taught via Zoom on Thursday, October 27th from 5:30-7:30 pm.  In order to receive credit for this seminar, you must attend all five sessions in their entirety.  *Please also keep Thursday Oct. 13 from 5:30-7:30 pm &  Friday, Oct. 14 from 11:00 am-1:00 pm available in your schedule this will be the alternate date in case the Sept. 22 & 23 dates need to be cancelled for any reason (please note that these alternate dates will only be taught if either the instructor or school needs to cancel the September dates.  They are not makeup sessions for missing the September class).
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
